wyld_woods.name: Craft the Crux Talisman
wyld_woods.description: Defeat Shies and craft their cruxes into the Crux Talisman.

wyld_woods.name: Reed's Boat: Powerful Glue
wyld_woods.description: Acquire materials from the Wyld Woods to complete Reed's boat.

wyld_woods.name: Help out Bughunter
wyld_woods.description: Help out the hungry Argofay Bughunter looking to "collect" Odonatas.

wyld_woods.name: Montezuma's First
wyld_woods.description: There is a fragment of Montezuma somewhere in the Wyld Woods.

wyld_woods.name: Montezuma's Second
wyld_woods.description: There is a fragment of Montezuma somewhere in the Rift Gallery.

wyld_woods.name: Eye: The Intruder
wyld_woods.description: Find Porhtal's eye in the Wizard Tower.

wyld_woods.name: Help Inverted Sirius
wyld_woods.description:
Inverted Sirius found a way to transfer items in-and-out of the Rift, but he's in a bit of a predicament

He's "standing" behind his shack.

wyld_woods.name: Talk to Sad Jacquelle
wyld_woods.description: Sad Jacquelle needs help to find her cat. She's on a branch next to her house in the Wyld Woods.

wyld_woods.name: Talk to Porhtal
wyld_woods.description: Porhtal knows a trick to fast travel in the Rift.

wyld_woods.name: Wear Enigma's Cloak
wyld_woods.description: Talk to Enigma at the base of the Wizard Tower and wear the Enigma Cloak.

wyld_woods.name: Talk to the Threebrothers
wyld_woods.description: Three argofays have a spare weapon somewhere in the trees.

wyld_woods.name: Wear the Wyld Armor Set
wyld_woods.description: Obtain the armor set from the Argofay Traffickers bing chilling in the treehouses.

wyld_woods.name: Enigma Souls
wyld_woods.description: Find the Enigma Souls in the Rift to upgrade your Enigma Cloak.

tasks.name: Enigma: Tough Bark
tasks.description: Bark bark bark. Find the glowing bark on the bark bark bark.

tasks.name: Enigma: Woods Flower Pot
tasks.description: A string of flower pots lead to an Enigma Soul somewhere in the Wyld Woods.

tasks.name: Enigma: Up in the Sky
tasks.description: There is an Enigma Soul waaay up in the sky.

tasks.name: Enigma: Next to Enigma
tasks.description: There is an Enigma Soul in Enigma's Crib. It's meant as an example soul, so it's awkward if you missed it!

tasks.name: Enigma: Fleespook
tasks.description: Follow the Fleespook in the Wyld Woods!

tasks.name: Enigma: Pressurized
tasks.description: There is an Enigma Soul under pressurized water in the Wyld Woods lake, but how to get in?

tasks.name: Enigma: Between Branches
tasks.description: An Enigma Soul is chilling mid-air somewhere between branches in the Wyld Woods.

tasks.name: Enigma: Two Plates
tasks.description: An Enigma Soul is locked in glass. Need two players!

tasks.name: Enigma: Wither Cage
tasks.description: There is an Enigma Soul hiding in plain sight near Porhtal.

black_lagoon.name: Montezuma's Third
black_lagoon.description: There is a fragment of Montezuma behind a waterfall, obviously.

black_lagoon.name: Slay Deadgehogs
black_lagoon.description: Craft a helmet upgrade using spines obtained from defeating deadgehogs.

black_lagoon.name: Defeat the Leech Supreme
black_lagoon.description: Help out the scientific community in the lagoon with some fantastic research.

black_lagoon.name: Eye: The Gillman
black_lagoon.description: Find Porhtal's eye in the Lagoon Hut.

black_lagoon.name: Talk to Reed
black_lagoon.description: Reed is stranded on the Lagoon Hut and it's not because he created a special profile.

black_lagoon.name: Enigma Souls
black_lagoon.description: Find the Enigma Souls in the Rift to upgrade your Enigma Cloak.

tasks.name: Enigma: Lagoon Cave
tasks.description: Complete the parkour while avoiding toxic water and... dirt.

tasks.name: Enigma: Roy
tasks.description: Purchase an Enigma Soul from Roy in one of the upstair rooms of the Lagoon Hut.

tasks.name: Enigma: Mushroom Guy
tasks.description: Mushroom Guy hid a soul in a tree near to him.

tasks.name: Enigma: Spinning Runes
tasks.description: Face all the runes towards the tree to envigor it.

tasks.name: Enigma: Tel Kar
tasks.description: Learn about the Rift from Tel Kar.

west_village.name: Craft the Crux Ring
west_village.description: Defeat Shadows and craft their cruxes into the Crux Ring.

west_village.name: Complete the Mirrorverse
west_village.description: Follow Dr. Emmett's story through his mirror puzzles and experiments.

west_village.name: Ward against the fireball
west_village.description: Sorcerer Okron is holding a giant fireball still. Collect glyphs and cast warding spells to protect the house.

west_village.name: Montezuma's Fourth
west_village.description: There is a fragment of Montezuma stashed on a roof in the West Village.

west_village.name: Cleanup the Infested House
west_village.description: Do Kat's job for her, fill the vermin bin and obtain the disinfestor gloves.

west_village.name: Hacking for dummies
west_village.description: Some unhinged kloon wants to hack the world.

west_village.name: Gunther's Race
west_village.description: Complete the race in the West Village and upgrade your boots.

west_village.name: Enigma Souls
west_village.description: Find the Enigma Souls in the Rift to upgrade your Enigma Cloak.

tasks.name: Enigma: Cake House #1
tasks.description: There are two Enigma Souls inside cake.

tasks.name: Enigma: Cake House #2
tasks.description: There are two Enigma Souls inside cake.

tasks.name: Enigma: Dolphin Parkour
tasks.description: Pretend to be a dolphin and complete the parkour to reach this soul.

tasks.name: Enigma: Hot Dog Contest
tasks.description: Help Joey McPizza to achieve his life goals.

tasks.name: Enigma: Fake Neuroscience
tasks.description: Help Kat disinfest the house to unlock her Enigma Soul.

tasks.name: Enigma: Between Roofs
tasks.description: An Enigma Soul is mid-air in the West Village.

tasks.name: Enigma: 2 Players Soul
tasks.description: One player uses the beacon, the other uses the hopper!

dreadfarm.name: Craft the Crux Artifact
dreadfarm.description: Defeat Volts and craft their cruxes into the Crux Artifact.

dreadfarm.name: Reed's Boat: Replacement Wood
dreadfarm.description: Acquire materials from the Dreadfarm to complete Reed's boat.

dreadfarm.name: Montezuma's Fifth
dreadfarm.description: There is a fragment of Montezuma behind a breakable wall in the Dreadfarm.

dreadfarm.name: Eye: The Baba Yaga
dreadfarm.description: Find Porhtal's eye in the Dreadfarm.

dreadfarm.name: Harvest for Shania
dreadfarm.description: Collect all the resources that Shania needs. This task completes once you wear Chicken Leggs!

dreadfarm.name: Enigma Souls
dreadfarm.description: Find the Enigma Souls in the Rift to upgrade your Enigma Cloak.

tasks.name: Enigma: Beanstalk
tasks.description: Grow and ascend the beanstalk and reach the top.

tasks.name: Enigma: Buttons
tasks.description:
Shoot all the buttons around the buildings of the West Village & Dreadfarm using a Blowgun. Or click them... they're buttons.

Requires completing "Harvest for Shania" in order to complete by yourself...

tasks.name: Enigma: Farm Balloons
tasks.description:
Pop all the balloons in the Dreadfarm using a blowgun

Requires completing "Harvest for Shania" in order to complete by yourself...

tasks.name: Enigma: Farm Flower Pot
tasks.description: A string of flower pots lead to an Enigma Soul somewhere in the Dreadfarm.

village_plaza.name: Craft the Crux Relic
village_plaza.description: Defeat Scribes and craft their cruxes into the Crux Relic.

village_plaza.name: Barry, Premier Leader of Skyblock
village_plaza.description: Deal with the protestors stressing out Barry about their needs and wants.

village_plaza.name: Shen Auctions
village_plaza.description: Damia is running auctions for Shen in the Rift auction house. Make a bid on an item!

village_plaza.name: Reed's Boat: Tasty Provisions
village_plaza.description: Acquire materials from the Village Plaza to complete Reed's boat.

village_plaza.name: Cowboy Nick's Rabbits
village_plaza.description: Feed Cowboy Nick's hungry rabbits with carrots.

village_plaza.name: Montezuma's Sixth
village_plaza.description: There is a fragment of Montezuma inside a book in the plaza.

village_plaza.name: Montezuma's Seventh
village_plaza.description: There is a fragment of Montezuma on an islet of the déjà vu alley.

village_plaza.name: Reverse-Murder Investigation
village_plaza.description: Assist Detective Amog in solving a murder case that is about to happen.

village_plaza.name: Eye: The Bankster
village_plaza.description: Find Porhtal's eye in the Village Plaza.

village_plaza.name: Seraphine's Horrible Face
village_plaza.description:
Seraphine was detransfigured when she attempted to cross into the Rift.

Requires completing "Barry, Premier Leader of SkyBlock" in order to complete by yourself...

village_plaza.name: Fancy Sneakers
village_plaza.description: Purchase good shoes from Seymour at the tailor's house. They last for life!

village_plaza.name: Enigma Souls
village_plaza.description: Find the Enigma Souls in the Rift to upgrade your Enigma Cloak.

tasks.name: Enigma: Back to Basics
tasks.description: Jump in the portal in the center of the plaza to go back to simpler times.

tasks.name: Enigma: Horsing Around
tasks.description: There is an Enigma Soul hidden deep inside the Half-Eaten Cave.

tasks.name: Enigma: Lonely Ävaeìkx
tasks.description: Hang out with Ävaeìkx to unlock their soul, but uh... not too close.

tasks.name: Enigma: Plaza Balloons
tasks.description:
Pop all the balloons in the Village Plaza using a blowgun.

Requires completing "Harvest for Shania" in order to complete by yourself...

tasks.name: Enigma: Rabbit in the Hat!
tasks.description: Reveal your inner magician. Also try to stay calm.

tasks.name: Enigma: Buy BZT Today
tasks.description: A rare convergence between technology and finance, buy today! Also, we're literally in a BLOCK game. Can't make this stuff up!

tasks.name: Enigma: Between Cooler Roofs
tasks.description: An Enigma Soul is mid-air in the Village Plaza.

tasks.name: Enigma: Plaza Fleespook
tasks.description: Follow the Fleespook in the Village Plaza!

living_cave.name: Craft the Crux Heirloom
living_cave.description: feat Frozilles and craft their cruxes into the Crux Heirloom.

living_cave.name: Reed's Boat: Living Anchor
living_cave.description: Acquire materials from the Living Cave to complete Reed's boat.

living_cave.name: Craft Self-Recursive Pickaxe
living_cave.description: Defeat Autonulls and use Nullified Metal to upgrade your sword into... a pickaxe.

living_cave.name: Juice up an Armor Piece
living_cave.description: Use Living Metal to craft and spawn a Null mob. Defeat it to juice up your armor.

living_cave.name: Max out your Suit
living_cave.description: Keep juicing up your armor pieces until you have the Living Metal Suit bonus on all of them.

living_cave.name: Craft the Living Timecharm
living_cave.description: Jump down to the Living Stillness and defeat Frozilles to craft the Living Timecharm.

living_cave.name: Obtain a Living Metal Heart
living_cave.description: Talk to the rock denizens of the living stillness to get a lead on how to obtain living metal hearts.

living_cave.name: Montezuma's Eight
living_cave.description: There is a fragment of Montezuma under snow in the living stillness.

living_cave.name: Enigma Souls
living_cave.description: Find the Enigma Souls in the Rift to upgrade your Enigma Cloak.

tasks.name: Enigma: Flowery Message
tasks.description: A string of flower pots lead to a complex set of instructions to unlock an Enigma Soul in the Living Cave.

tasks.name: Enigma: Behind a Living Wall
tasks.description: There is an Enigma Soul behind a breakable wall in the Living Cave.

colosseum.name: Reed's Boat: Powerful Glue
colosseum.description: Acquire materials from the Colosseum to complete Reed's boat.

colosseum.name: Defeat Bacte
colosseum.description: Assemble your friends and defeat the plagued remnants of a dictator who is still trying to infect everyone's life.

colosseum.name: Eye: Gooey
colosseum.description: Find Porhtal's eye in the Colosseum.

colosseum.name: Enigma Souls
colosseum.description: Find the Enigma Souls in the Rift to upgrade your Enigma Cloak.

tasks.name: Enigma: Full Circle
tasks.description: Talk with the Mole and go full circle around the Colosseum.

stillgore_chateau.name: Craft the Crux Chronomicon
stillgore_chateau.description: Defeat Splatters and craft their cruxes into the Crux Chronomicon.

stillgore_chateau.name: Montezuma's Ninth
stillgore_chateau.description: There is a fragment of Montezuma somewhere on the way to the château.

stillgore_chateau.name: Eye: The Prince
stillgore_chateau.description: Find Porhtal's eye around the château.

stillgore_chateau.name: Obtain Healing Melon
stillgore_chateau.description: Monsters deal ❤ damage in the Stillgore Château, obtain a Healing Melon from killing vampires.

stillgore_chateau.name: Enigma Souls
stillgore_chateau.description: Find the Enigma Souls in the Rift to upgrade your Enigma Cloak.

tasks.name: Enigma: Castle Balloons
tasks.description:
Pop all the balloons in the Stillgore Château using a blowgun.

Requires completing "Harvest for Shania" in order to complete by yourself...

tasks.name: Enigma: Castle Flower Pot
tasks.description: A string of flower pots lead to an Enigma Soul somewhere in the Stillgore Château.

tasks.name: Enigma: Castle Fleespook
tasks.description: Follow the Fleespook in the Stillgore Château!

tasks.name: Enigma: Standing there
tasks.description: An Enigma Soul is just standing there somewhere in the castle islet. What a weirdo!

tasks.name: Enigma: Fairylosopher
tasks.description: A Fairylosopher is selling an Enigma Soul in their tower.

tasks.name: Enigma: Between Towers
tasks.description: An Enigma Soul is mid-air in the Stillgore Château.

mountaintop.name: Craft the Celestial Starstone
mountaintop.description: Defeat Puffs and craft their cruxes into the Celestial Starstone.

mountaintop.name: Eye: The 7th Sin
mountaintop.description: Find Porhtal's eye in the lands above.

mountaintop.name: The Richest Man in the Multiverse
mountaintop.description: Find Shen and complete his puzzles.

mountaintop.name: Close the Breach
mountaintop.description: You thought there was a hidden clue here, didn't you?

mountaintop.name: Second Reverse-Murder
mountaintop.description: Assist Detective Amog in solving a murder case... Again.

mountaintop.name: Eleanor
mountaintop.description: Help all the Eleanors on the mountain.

tasks.name: Eleanor I
tasks.description: Help Eleanor I.

tasks.name: Eleanor V
tasks.description: Help Eleanor V.

tasks.name: Eleanor VII
tasks.description: Help Eleanor VII.

tasks.name: Eleanor IX
tasks.description: Help Eleanor IX.

tasks.name: Eleanor X
tasks.description: Help Eleanor X.

mountaintop.name: Enigma Souls
mountaintop.description: Find the Enigma Souls in the Rift to upgrade your Enigma Cloak.

tasks.name: Enigma: Mountain Balloons
tasks.description: Pop all the balloons in The Mountaintop using a blowgun.

tasks.name: Enigma: Rose's End Flower Pot
tasks.description: A string of flower pots lead to an Enigma Soul somewhere in The Mountaintop.

tasks.name: Enigma: Ikrus
tasks.description: Help Ikrus squat his way out of the Rift.

tasks.name: Enigma: Leap of Faith
tasks.description: Jump.

tasks.name: Enigma: Fleespook
tasks.description: Follow the Fleespook in The Mountaintop!

tasks.name: Enigma: Sun Gecko
tasks.description: Purchase an Enigma Soul from the Sun Gecko Essence Shop.

tasks.name: Enigma: Ubik's Averages
tasks.description: Choose the correct Number.

tasks.name: Enigma: Ubik's Boxes
tasks.description: Choose the correct Box from Ubik.

tasks.name: Enigma: Unik's Tit for Tats
tasks.description: Play Split or Steal with Ubik.

tasks.name: Enigma: Walk of Fame
tasks.description: There is an Enigma Soul near some horse-relevant hay in the Walk of Fame.
